sections.title: COLING-90 Papers presented to the 13th International Conference on Computational Linguistics on the occasion of the 25th Anniversary of COLING and the 350th Anniversary of Helsinki University Ed. Hans Karlgren Vol. 1
paragraphs: THE COLING CONFERENCES have been organized, since 1965, by the INTERNATIONAL COMMITTEE ON COMPUTATIONAL LINGUISTICS HONONARY MEMBERS: David G. Hays, New York H. Wada, Tokyo President: Martin Kay, Palo Alto Vice President

A Eva Hajicov~, Prague Secretary General: Don E. Walker Bellcor MRE 2A379 445 South Street, Box 1910 Morristown, NJ 07960-1910, USA fax:+l-201-2920067 e-mail:walker@flash.bellcor.com Members: Christian Boitet, Grenoble Nicoletta Calzolari, Pisa Brian Harris, Ottawa Kolbjorn Heggstad, Bergen Hans Karlgren, Stockholm Ol'ga S. Kulagina, Moscow Winfried Lenders, Bonn Makato Nagao, Kyoto Helmut Schnelle, Bochum Petr Sgall, Prague Yorick Wilks, Las Cruces, NM Antonito Zampolli, Pisa COLING 90 was hosted by the University of Helsinki LOCAL ORGANIZING COMMITTEE CHAIR: Fred Karlsson Department of General Linguistics & Research Unit for Computational Linguistics University of Helsinki Hallituskatu ii SF-00100 Helsinki, Finland phone +358-0-1913512 (job)

+358-0-790507 (home) fax +358-0-653726 telex: 124690 unih sf e-maiI:KARLSSON@FINUH MEMBERS: Lauri Carlson Research Unit for Computational University of Helsinki Harri Jippinen SITRA Foundation, Helsinki Kimmo Koskenniemi Research Unit for Computational University of Helsinki Jouko Sepp~nen Helsinki University of Exhibition Secretary Linguistics, Linguistics, Technology
